sub_fields.label: Partner group label
sub_fields.name: partner_group_label
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the label for this partner group, e.g. 'Sponsors', or sponsorship levels for fundraisers, such as 'Community Connector'.
sub_fields.default_value: This program presented in partnership with:

sub_fields.label: Partner Name
sub_fields.name: partner_name
sub_fields.instructions: Enter Partner's name if no logo is available, e.g. 'Alan Schriesheim'.

fields.label: Location Name
fields.name: location_name
fields.instructions: Enter the name of the location, e.g. Chicago Public Library, Harold Washington Center

fields.label: Registration URL
fields.name: registration_url
fields.instructions: Enter URL for Eventbrite page or other event posting here
